title: aiyappanai paNivOm
sahitya:
aiyappanai paNivOm ulagIl koDum asura samhAr-AvatAra mUrtiyAm 


anupallavi

  mei anbargaL manam virumbum varam tara mEdini engum niraindaruL sundara 


caraNam    akhilalOka paripAlakanai shrI hariharar InraruL bAlakanai
paghaivar azhiya shabari malai ezhundaruL parama dayALanai surar tozhum tALanai
